```lisp
[
    '(:action place ; Place an item in a specific location or container
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
        (inventory ?p ?item)
        (or (container ?location) (freezer ?location) (shelf ?location))
        (not (in_location ?item ?location))
    )
    :effect (and
        (in_location ?item ?location)
        (when (container ?location) (airtight ?location))
    )
    )',
    
    '(:action separate ; Separate items using a specified method
    :parameters (?actor - player ?items - object ?method - method)
    :precondition (and
        (in_container ?items ?container)
        (not (separated ?items))
    )
    :effect (separated ?items)
    )',
    
    '(:action thaw ; Thaw a frozen item
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?location1 - location ?location2 - location)
    :precondition (and
        (in_location ?item ?location1)
        (frozen ?item)
    )
    :effect (and
        (not (in_location ?item ?location1))
        (in_location ?item ?location2)
        (not (frozen ?item))
    )
    )'
]
```
